description: Denominators of continued fraction convergents to sqrt(382).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
formula: a(n) = 329996879998*a(n-24) - a(n-48) for n>47. - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Dec 23 2013
maple: convert(sqrt(382), confrac, 30, cvgts): denom(cvgts); # _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Dec 23 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
